definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Every polynomial is differentiable , and so is every rational .
sentences.chinese: 每個多項式都是可微的，而每個有理函數也是如此。

sentences.english: You will see why. It is defined and differentiable in R.
sentences.chinese: 你們會明白爲什麼的，它在R上有定義，且是可微的。

sentences.english: The unknown displacement field is approximated by discontinuous , piecewisely differentiable functions.
sentences.chinese: 用間斷分片可微的函數來近似未知位移場。

sentences.english: Finally, it is pointed out that the directional differentiability is equivalent to the quaSi-differentiability in one-dimensional space.
sentences.chinese: 最後指出了在一維情形下方向可微與擬可微是等價的。

sentences.english: In general, the optimal value functions of parametric nonlinear programming are non-differentiable and are not explicitly expressed.
sentences.chinese: 參數規劃的極值函數一般是非可微的且沒有顯示錶示。

sentences.english: OK, so most of the functions we'll see are differentiable.
sentences.chinese: 因此大多數我們會遇到的函數都是可微的。

sentences.english: As a special case, the viability of epigraph of a sub- differentiable function is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後討論了次可微函數上圖的生存性問題。

definition: derived function/derivative f' of a function f
(math.) an analytic function (of a complex variable)
